I have a small problem. I tried using the region reset tweak and now my region change option has been disabled and it has changed to region A by default and region counter is now 0. Please help
First run Blu-Ray_Region_Reset.bat and then re-install PowerDVD, this is needed to reset the Blu-Ray region to the original values.
